item.title: Insanity-pkz = pking server
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:5, topic:446389”]Amazing!

[size=2pt]No this sucks.[/size][/quote]
He’s misadvertised it lol, better than your work and I spent 2 days on it so smfd.

Read full topic

item.title: Insanity-pkz = pking server
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:2, topic:446389”]Looks like a total leech if I’m honest.

You should maybe take away some of the commands and assign them to buttons/buttons on interfaces.[/quote]
Thats because currently it is a leach lol(things have been added to it of course). Can’t put the updated source on till its semi complete. Things how the source work and being revamped and if I put it online semi complete it will be prone to abuse.
The things that I’ve added so far to the source that isn’t online yet(some are on the online one)

added stackable system Currency is spirit shards added dicing, percentile only - timers need to be added(very basic) added magic dmg % boosts to stream sol ancient staff chaotic staff ahrims staff, need to add to equiptment bonuses Stalls redone (need to add, successfull/fail thiev) has timers. Didn't realise their was already magic dmg % boosts, however it does the same thing roughly so its fine but one should be removed sometime.. Probably remove original one as this one seems to be done better. Added antique lamps, code is in.. for some reason buttons on interface dont work. Antiquelamps.java seem fine ods - 2528 6543 10889 11137 11157 14575 14711

added empty command
Censored names, if the name contains a word in the list it’ll be auto banned i.e. fuck isn’t aloud so if a person made an account called Fuck Me they’d be autobanned(not ip).

Put in some cases for bank booths etc, i.e. varrock banks seers village banks.
Changed ::master to only give combat stats(exluding summoning, hate summoning in rsps always badly done) so that players can skill until the server is fully made into a eco.
Also, going to add in voting which rewards the player according to their total level, don’t want every maxed total haha!

Put old furnace(11666) ontop of edgeville one cause it was pissing me off, timers need to be sorted in smithing.
Added working doors(deletes door temporairly), actionhandler search door to add more
Added working Divine(doesn’t drain prayer, 30% damage reduction) and ely(70% chance of 25% damage reduction).
Changed the korasiDamage formula, not quite like Rs but better than what was implemented.
Added password strengths into client, weak is 4, medium 6, strong 9 - all in client.java to change.

Need to add teles[

Read full topic
